creator: sabreware@earthlink.net
text:
<fmt:Bundle basename='app' scope='session'/> should store a resource bundle in 
the javax.servlet.jsp.jstl.fmt.localizationContext config setting for session 
scope. Instead, I get this validation error:

Validation error messages from tag library fmt
null: Illegal scope attribute without var in "fmt:setBundle" tag.

(From 20020422 build)
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 8225 ***
creator: jan.luehe@sun.com

text:
Taglib directive of the page that triggered this issue was using a custom URI
("standard-fmt") instead of the "standard" URI ("http://java.sun.com/jstl/fmt")
that is specified in fmt.tld.
Because of this, the FMT TLV did not consider the page's tags as JSTL tags,
prompting it to flag a dangling-scope error where one was not expected.
